fullDescription.text: mat-a11y accessibility rule that checks for mat icon accessibility
mat-a11y accessibility rule that checks for prefers reduced motion
mat-a11y accessibility rule that checks for duplicate id aria
mat-a11y accessibility rule that checks for content overflow
mat-a11y accessibility rule that checks for focus within support
mat-a11y accessibility rule that checks for small font size
mat-a11y accessibility rule that checks for color contrast
mat-a11y accessibility rule that checks for pointer events none

message.text:
mat-icon used as interactive without accessible label. Screen readers cannot announce icon-only buttons
  How to fix:
    - Add aria-label to parent button
    - Add visually-hidden text
    - Add aria-hidden="true" if purely decorative
  WCAG 4.1.2: Name, Role, Value | See: https://material.angular.io/components/icon/overview#accessibility
  Found: <mat-icon>close</mat-icon>

mat-icon used as interactive without accessible label. Screen readers cannot announce icon-only buttons
  How to fix:
    - Add aria-label to parent button
    - Add visually-hidden text
    - Add aria-hidden="true" if purely decorative
  WCAG 4.1.2: Name, Role, Value | See: https://material.angular.io/components/icon/overview#accessibility
  Found: <mat-icon class="no-components-icon">web</mat-icon>

mat-icon used as interactive without accessible label. Screen readers cannot announce icon-only buttons
  How to fix:
    - Add aria-label to parent button
    - Add visually-hidden text
    - Add aria-hidden="true" if purely decorative
  WCAG 4.1.2: Name, Role, Value | See: https://material.angular.io/components/icon/overview#accessibility
  Found: <mat-icon>edit</mat-icon>

Animation without prefers-reduced-motion support. Animations can cause vestibular disorders and motion sickness
  How to fix:
    - Add @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) query
    - Disable or reduce animation when preference is set
  WCAG 2.3.3: Animation from Interactions
  Found: File uses animations and transitions without properly disabling them in prefers-reduced-motion: redu...

aria-controls references non-existent id "hidden-categories". Broken ARIA reference provides no accessibility benefit
  How to fix:
    - Add element with matching id
    - Correct the id reference
    - Remove the broken reference
  WCAG 4.1.1: Parsing
  Found: aria-controls="hidden-categories"

aria-controls references non-existent id "hidden-categories". Broken ARIA reference provides no accessibility benefit
  How to fix:
    - Add element with matching id
    - Correct the id reference
    - Remove the broken reference
  WCAG 4.1.1: Parsing
  Found: aria-controls="hidden-categories"

Content may be hidden without visual indication in "Visually hidden utility for screen reader only content
.visually-hidden". Text content may be cut off and inaccessible to users.
  How to fix:
    - Add "text-overflow: ellipsis" to show truncation indicator (...)
    - Or remove "overflow: hidden" to allow text to wrap naturally
    - Or ensure content is accessible through other means (tooltips, expand buttons)
  WCAG 1.4.10: Reflow

Potential content overflow detected in "h3". This may hide text content inaccessibly.
  How to fix:
    - Verify all content remains accessible when overflow is hidden
    - Consider using "overflow: auto" or "overflow: scroll" for scrollable content
    - Ensure responsive design allows content to reflow at 320px width
  WCAG 1.4.10: Reflow

Potential content overflow detected in "p". This may hide text content inaccessibly.
  How to fix:
    - Verify all content remains accessible when overflow is hidden
    - Consider using "overflow: auto" or "overflow: scroll" for scrollable content
    - Ensure responsive design allows content to reflow at 320px width
  WCAG 1.4.10: Reflow

Complex interactive containers without :focus-within. Keyboard users may not see clear visual indication when navigating nested focusable elements.
  How to fix:
    - Add :focus-within pseudo-class to container selectors
    - Or ensure child elements (a, button, input) have visible :focus styles
    - Apply visual styles (border, background, shadow) when children are focused
    - Example: .container:focus-within { outline: 2px solid blue; }
    - Test with keyboard navigation to ensure focus is always visible
  WCAG 2.4.7: Focus Visible
  Found: Complex containers (.card-arrow)

Animation without prefers-reduced-motion support. Animations can cause vestibular disorders and motion sickness
  How to fix:
    - Add @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) query
    - Disable or reduce animation when preference is set
  WCAG 2.3.3: Animation from Interactions
  Found: File uses transitions without properly disabling them in prefers-reduced-motion: reduce

Font size 11px may be too small. Small text is difficult for users with low vision
  How to fix:
    - Use minimum 16px (1rem) for body text
    - Use relative units (rem, em) for scalability
    - Test at 200% zoom
  WCAG 1.4.4: Resize Text
  Found: ".chip-count"

Font size 11px may be too small. Small text is difficult for users with low vision
  How to fix:
    - Use minimum 16px (1rem) for body text
    - Use relative units (rem, em) for scalability
    - Test at 200% zoom
  WCAG 1.4.4: Resize Text
  Found: ".coming-soon-badge"

Highly transparent text is difficult to read. Low opacity reduces effective contrast
  How to fix:
    - Increase opacity to at least 0.55
    - Use solid colors for text
  WCAG 1.4.3: Contrast (Minimum)
  Found: "rgba($color-primary, 0.15)"

Highly transparent text is difficult to read. Low opacity reduces effective contrast
  How to fix:

    - Use solid colors for text

  Found: "rgba($color-green, 0.15)"

  Found: "rgba($color-primary-dark, 0.12)"

pointer-events: none may hide interactive element. Users cannot interact with elements that have pointer-events disabled
  How to fix:
    - Ensure element is not intended to be interactive
    - Use disabled attribute instead for form elements
  WCAG 2.1.1: Keyboard
  Found: button styling } } } .gallery-preview-overlay

    - Test at 200% zoom
  WCAG 1.4.4: Resize Text
  Found: "include phone"
